column1: Table 10: Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2004
Authors:  Paige M. Harrison and Allen J. Beck
Table 10. Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2004

Note: Based on estimates by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age from the 2003-04 Survey of Inmates in State Correctional Facilities (forthcoming) and updated from jurisdiction counts by gender at yearend.
Estimates were rounded to the nearest 100. See Methodology for details.
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, other Pacific Islanders, and persons identifying two or more races.
b/Excludes Hispanics and persons identifying two or more races.
